an6.71:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu abhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunitum sati sati ayatane.
an6.71:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘ime hanabhagiya dhamma’ti yathabhutam nappajanati, ‘ime thitibhagiya dhamma’ti yathabhutam nappajanati, ‘ime visesabhagiya dhamma’ti yathabhutam nappajanati, ‘ime nibbedhabhagiya dhamma’ti yathabhutam nappajanati, asakkaccakari ca hoti, asappayakari ca.
an6.71:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu abhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunitum sati sati ayatane.
an6.71:2.1: Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunitum sati sati ayatane.
an6.71:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘ime hanabhagiya dhamma’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ime thitibhagiya dhamma’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ime visesabhagiya dhamma’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ime nibbedhabhagiya dhamma’ti yathabhutam pajanati, sakkaccakari ca hoti, sappayakari ca.
an6.71:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu bhabbo tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbatam papunitum sati sati ayatane”ti.
